cast.name: 玛格丽特·泰特 Margaret Tait

awards:
第73届柏林国际电影节(2023)
　　论坛单元 卡里加里奖(提名) 卢克·福勒
this_title: Being in a Place – A Portrait of Margaret Tait
trans_title: 身在此地：玛格丽特·泰特的肖像
introduction: Luke Fowler’s portrait of Scottish poet and filmmaker Margaret Tait takes its inspiration from her unrealised project about her home region of Orkney, drawing and riffing on her notes and footage to produce a blissful union of two artistic sensibilities.源自：https://www.berlinale.de/en/2023/programme/202303632.html
chinese_title: 身在此地：玛格丽特·泰特的肖像
foreign_title: Being in a Place – A Portrait of Margaret Tait
